entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HttpClinet timeout during trimming tests #110707
  • Missed strength reduction #110706
  • System.Globalization.RegionInfo.CurrentRegion returns blank values on Maui #110704
  • OverflowException in LoggerMessageGenerator #110698
    10.0.0
  • Interop Type Mapping #110691
    10.0.0
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder: unable to retrieve resources added with AddManifestResource #110686
  • Test hole for TrackerObjectManager #110684
  • ASSERT(ThreadStore::IsTrapThreadsRequested()) in Thread::InlineTryFastReversePInvoke #110683
  • Wrong result from CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.Name in iOS #110680
    10.0.0

Closed

  • Suggested enhancements to CheckProjects #10783
    Future
  • [Perf][Windows_NT][x64 & x64] Investigate ByteMark/BenchEmFloatClass improvement #9832
    Future
  • [Perf][Windows_NT][x64 & x64] Investigate ByteMark/BenchEmFloat improvement #9831
    Future
  • Property getter not getting inlined #9632
    Future
  • Prepare the JIT for a standalone build #5510
    Future
  • Arm64 altjit simd issues #9988
    Future
  • [Perf] Investigate Serialization/JsonBenchmarks/SerializeJsonNet Improvement between release/2.0.0 and release/2.1 #9845
    Future
  • [Perf] Investigate Serialization/JsonBenchmarks/SerializeDataContractJson Improvement between release/2.0.0 and release/2.1 #9844
    Future
  • [Perf] Investigate Serialization/JsonBenchmarks/SerializeDataContract Improvement between release/2.0.0 and release/2.1 #9843
    Future
  • [Perf][Windows_NT][x86 & x64] Investigate V8/Richards/Support/Bench improvement #9835
    Future
  • [Perf][Windows_NT][x86] Investigate V8/Crypto/Support/Bench improvement #9834
    Future
  • [Perf][Windows_NT] Investigate ByteMark/BenchAssignRectangular improvement. #9827
    Future
  • [Perf][Windows_NT][x64] Investigate ByteMark/BenchAssignJagged improvement. #9824
    Future
  • Community notifications #109961
  • [Wasm][Profiled AOT] Error: TaskT_TransitionToFinal_AlreadyCompleted #77122
    10.0.0
  • JIT: `fgRemoveBlock` does not maintain edge weights #96614
    Future
  • Error CS0009: Metadata file '/__w/1/s/artifacts/tests/coreclr/AnyOS.x64.Checked/readytorun/determinism/crossgen2determinism/crossgen2smoke/helperildll.dll' could not be opened #110559
  • Windows Defender incorrectly detects malware in ZIP files containing .NET 9 AOT binaries #110541
  • ILCompiler package used in runtime without ensuring matching framework #106740
    10.0.0
  • Cannot build Native AOT for win32 on linux #108587
    Future
  • NativeAOT library folder structure hygiene #108649
    10.0.0
  • IDE Warnings not reported with 9.0.101 #110673
  • GetType() in base class constructor returns differently as in a plugin assembly, with its host program either normally compiled or published as single package. #110679
  • Work to complete the ReJIT on attach feature #12058
  • [Uri] Add methods for urlpath/virtualpath manipulation #29736
  • Bi-modal execution time of System.Net.Http outerloop tests #30257
  • Diagnostics eventcommand argument error when run generic host on netframework #109712
    10.0.0
  • After upgrade to 8.0.0, setting AOT compilation to true breaks published Blazor app. #95322
    8.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [Test Only] Port the Idna test fixes to support Unicode 15 #110705
    area-System.Globalization
  • [cdac] Remove GetMethodDescData fallback to legacy DAC #110702
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Vectorize System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary #110701
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Collections
  • [cdac] Clear cached data as part of IXCLRDataProcess::Flush #110700
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove thread pointer field from AwareLock #110699
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #110695
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Compute `fgCalledCount` earlier #110693
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • vxsort: Add Arm64 Neon implementation and tests #110692
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add linux-riscv64 nativeaot runtime build #110688
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Fix HostActivation.Tests unknown-rid #110687
    community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
  • Fix calling convention mismatch in GC callouts #110685
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [tests] Fix recently added mono test #110682
    needs-area-label
  • Clarify native AOT build instructions #110681
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update Stepping through GenericPInvokeCalli Stub under the Debugger #110677
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Build the "in build" crossgen2 into a pack that we can use within the VMR #110676
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: capture class types when spilling a GDV arg #110675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Remove unused `Precode::IsCorrectMethodDesc` #110703
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] NativeAOT-LLVM support in browser-bench #110611
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Implement GCCover portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #110322
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] Fix `ISOSDacInterface13.TraverseLoaderHeap` parameter type #110678
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Handle non-IL method descs in `RuntimeTypeSystem_1.GetMethodClassificationDataType` #110602
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix crash when pTargetMD is null #110652
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • JIT: Spill newarr into temp #110518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove FabricBot from area-owners.md #110525
    area-Meta
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109143
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • JIT: Add an "init BB" invariant #110404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add bench output log, to the file and to the console #110669
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove always-true `fgCanRelocateEHRegions` #110612
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete .GuardCF library build #110671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [JIT] Add legacy extended EVEX encoding and EVEX.ND/NF feature to x64 emitter backend #108796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Support disabling event tracing #110622
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [no-merge][testing] Try Apple mobile platforms on iOS 18 and XCode 16.1 #110566
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Improve codegen for ExtractMostSignificatBits #110662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid remorphing general `gtFoldExpr` return #110658
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Refine assert for RMW check in crc32 codegen #108750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Don't wait for finalizers in 'IReferenceTrackerHost::ReleaseDisconnectedReferenceSources' #110558
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix crash when pTargetMD is null #110651
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.13
  • [WASI] bump WASI SDK to v25.0 #110654
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Use managed signer for bundles #110417
    area-HostModel
  • [RISC-V] JIT: Fix emitInsMayWriteToGCReg #110390
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Change assembler to clang in android MonoAOT #110393
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add MemoryExtensions overloads with comparer #110197
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Repair profile after tail-merging #110656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use IRootFunctions in Tensor.StdDev #110641
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix base type marking for DAM annotated classes #110655
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Beginnings of native Android build #110471
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android
